image_search.search_files package¶

Submodules¶

image_search.search_files.fb_search module¶

image_search.search_files.fb_search.facebook_image_search(username, user_id=None)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • username – Username of the person to search eg: tusharmakkar08
  • user_id – User Id of the person (integral number) eg: 647452998
Returns:

image_search.search_files.github_search module¶

image_search.search_files.github_search.github_image_downloader(url, directory_to_download=None)[source]¶

Downloads Github images in a particular directory :param url: Github username url eg: https://github.com/tusharmakkar08 :param directory_to_download: Directory where files will be downloaded , if this is none then files downloaded to default directory :return:

image_search.search_files.instagram_search module¶

image_search.search_files.instagram_search.instagram_image_downloader(url, directory_to_download=None)[source]¶

Downloads Instagram images in a particular directory :param url: Instagram username url eg: https://www.instagram.com/tusharmakkar08/ :param directory_to_download: Directory where files will be downloaded , if this is none then files downloaded to default directory :return:

image_search.search_files.linkedin_search module¶

image_search.search_files.linkedin_search.linkedin_image_downloader(url, directory_to_download=None)[source]¶

Downloads LinkedIn images in a particular directory :param url: LinkedIn username url eg: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tusharmakkar08 :param directory_to_download: Directory where files will be downloaded , if this is none then files downloaded to default directory :return:

image_search.search_files.quora_search module¶

image_search.search_files.quora_search.quora_image_downloader(url, directory_to_download=None)[source]¶

Downloads Quora images in a particular directory :param url: Quora username url eg: https://www.quora.com/profile/Tushar-Makkar :param directory_to_download: Directory where files will be downloaded , if this is none then files downloaded to default directory :return:
